text:
During s5 @_nightsweekends 

I'm building @UseBanter, the social network for sports fans. 

We want to make it super easy for you to connect with other fans of your favorite teams in your city, both online and at IRL watch parties and games. 

@_buildspace https://t.co/LFFHU3ddtT
